name: Qat
description:
Play a Kumo, a cat white as a cloud, and try to find a way to help your friend and master, Takeo, a leader of the mage resistance. 

Travel across a country where magic is illegal and mages are resented. Challenge the Empire, help during a decisive battle, and save your friends.

Are you up for the challenge?

[THIS IS A SCHOOL PROJECT]

This version is a demo, meaning some features are still WIPs. Thanks for understanding.
